p: Stakeholders in all the VCs will increase their profits in different ways. In traditional markets, growers are more likely to cause quality issues as they take steps to reduce their costs and increase their profits. VCs 1 and 2 are typical examples of traditional markets. In these VCs, in order to achieve a high yield without the help of professional guidance, excessive amounts of chemical drugs may be used, and some unreasonable measures degrade the quality of the RA. Therefore, quality problems are common in these VCs and the RA produced can readily enter the traditional markets but provide relatively low income.
